transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Ji, ab aa rahi hai aawaz?
Hanji sir, bataiye.

Customer: Mai ye keh raha hu aapko kab se bana diya inhone?

Executive: Ye kal hi hua tha sir, pehli transfer hua hai mujhe.

Customer: Achcha achcha, kal hua hai?
Executive: Hanji, hanji kal hi hua hai mujhe ye aur aaj mujhe iske liye mail aaya tha to mai aapko call kar rahi thi but aapne customer care pe call laga diya.

Customer: Nahi mujhse to ye keh rahe the ye do din pehle kar diya aapko Somwar ko hi, Monday ko.

Executive: Process me time lagta hai na sir, ho gaya tha usi time pe but hamare paas jab tak nahi aata tab tak hum call nahi kar sakte. To mere paas abhi aaya hai.

Customer: Mujhe to ye keh rahe the aapka kaam ho gaya hai, aapke paas me paanch-chhe ghante me call aayegi.

Executive: Haan sir, unhone apna kaam apne end se kar diya tha lekin process hone me bhi to time lagta hai na sir.

Customer: To kitna din lagta hai madam, aaj Vishwakarma hai. Char din lagte hai kya professor hone me? Ye dekho aap.

Executive: Wo to dekho transfer hota hai na to purane jitne aapke accounts manager se jo jo baatein hui hoti hai na, wo saari cheeze mere paas transfer hoti hai. Uske according hi mai aapse baat karungi na. Ab maan lijiye purane account manager se aapki kya kya baatein hui hai kya kya nahi mujhe pata hi nahi hai. Fir mai apna wala matlab apni baatein karungi to fir aap bhi bologe na ki kitni baar aapko ye saari cheeze bataya gaya hai fir bhi aap mujhse puch rahe ho.

Executive: To wo saari cheeze thodi si time lag jata hai. Mere paas bhi abhi aaya hai turant kuch din pehle, matlab kuch der pehle to maine aapko dekha to mai aapko call kar rahi thi but aapne 96 pe call kar diya.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Hanji, to customer care pe call lagata to kya puchna tha waha se bataiye?

Customer: Nahi kuch nahi puchna tha aur kya.

Executive: Achcha, theek hai. Aaj aapke liye kuch leads vagera consume kiya hai abhi tak?

Customer: Nahi.

Executive: Lead aapne consume nahi kiya hai?

Customer: Nahi.

Executive: Maaf karna sir, actually yaha pe network nahi hai na thoda aawaz kat raha hoga to isliye mai thoda tez tez baat kar rahi hu.

Customer: Koi nahi, koi nahi kar sakte ho bhai.

Executive: Nahi nahi sir, matlab mujhe bhi aisa lag raha hai ki bahut tez tez mai baat kar rahi hu to aap bura mat manna. Aur sir mujhe ye bataiye ki marble God statue jo hai, iska matlab haan ye iski aap leads to consume kar rahe hai but iska kuch aisa koi category hai kya jo out of stock ho?

Customer: Category ka matlab?

Executive: Matlab iska marble jo matlab aapke paas to Bhagwan ki bahut saari murtiya hongi na to usme se koi aisa product hai jo out of stock ho?

Customer: Out of stock ka matlab kya hai? Thoda Hindi boliye aap.

Executive: Achcha achcha sorry sorry, matlab out of stock matlab wo abhi aapke usme hai matlab khatam ho gaya hai kya uska stock?

Executive: Aapke matlab wo hai product hai abhi aapki dukan pe aapke shop pe?

Customer: Hai nahi to banate hai hum to daily naya naya product kaun sa.
Executive: Achcha achcha haan mai bas yahi puch rahi thi. Aur aapne jaise ki aaj koi lead consume nahi kiya hai to aap mai aap kaam ek kaam karti hu ye WhatsApp pe hai na aapka number ye wala number?

Customer: Haan, haan.

Executive: Ye 078 wale pe?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Theek hai theek hai to mai ek kaam karungi aapko leads share kar diya karungi aap apne phone se wo lead na consume kariyega aur mai aapko link hi share kar dungi link pe jaise aap click karoge to direct us lead ki jo wo hota hai na profile wo khul jayega waha se aap consume kar sakte ho.

Executive: Theek hai? Aur call ka kya bol bata rahe the?
Customer: Coaching kaun deta hai?
Executive: Haanji?
Customer: Call vagera kuch nahi hai. Coaching kaun deta hai inko IndiaMART walo ko sabko bolne ki?

Executive: Kaise bolne ki matlab?

Customer: Bolne ke liye kaun bolta hai aapko ki itna meetha bola karo, aise aise bolte hai tab jaake customer apna aap ban jata hai.

Executive: Aisa to kuch coaching milta nahi hai sir, kyu matlab maine kuch galat bola aapko?

Customer: Nahi aap galat kyu bologe?

Executive: Nahi agar kuch galat bola hoga to maafi chahti hu.

Customer: Nahi coaching to hai aapki sabki na. Coaching to karate hai ye sab aapko.

Executive: Nahi nahi sir hum join hote hai aur fir hamara jo kaam hota hai hum wo karte hai bas.

Customer: Nahi nahi.

Executive: To aapko hum na bhej deti hu ek kaam karti hu WhatsApp pe details aapko jo bol rahe ho na ki mujhe leads batao to unhe bhej deti hu aap waha se ek baar dekh ke mobile me consume kar lijiye.

Executive: Theek hai? Aur koi number hai kya aapka WhatsApp pe?

Customer: Nahi yahi number hai.

Executive: Theek hai aur kuch puchna hai sir aapko bataiye?

Customer: Are puch puch to kya madam mai to pareshan ho gaya IndiaMART se na. Sahi baat aapko batau. Agar IndiaMART mero band ho jaye to mai dusri company chalu kar lu.

Executive: Dusri company to sir aapki Balaji Murti to chal hi rahi hai na?

Customer: Nahi Balaji Murti ko badal ke Justdial me jana chahta hu mai to.

Executive: Achcha achcha to sir agar aapka aisa kuch scenario hai to aap waha bhi apna try kar sakte ho.

Customer: Aisa ho sakta hai kya? Do company chal jayengi ek sath?
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Kyuki madam mai hum kya hai ki kam padhe likhe hai hum hai wo mazdoor aadmi. Mazdoor samajhte ho aap?

Executive: Sir dekhiye aap apna business kaam kar rahe ho hum bhi apna kaam kar rahe hai. Hum ye nahi bolenge ki wo company kharab hai ya fir aap jis jis ka naam le rahe ho na Justdial ya fir wo hum matlab unki kyu burai karenge?

Executive: Wo to aapke upar hai na. Kaam to aapko nikalna hai.

Customer: Hum to mazdoor aadmi hai madam.

Executive: Aisa kyu bol rahe hai?
Customer: Haan hum mazdoor aadmi hai dekho aur hum kam padhe likhe hai theek hai aur hume to IndiaMART hume hamare phone se hatana nahi aata kaise hatega. Nahi hum isme dusri lead bhi wo dusro wo bolte hai na product bana le ya IndiaMART ke liye.

Customer: Wo humko itna bana nahi hai. Dusra hum bana lete hai.

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Isiliye bol raha hu aur kya hai. Agar isko band karna chahte hai.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir, mai ek kaam karungi apne end se jitni leads agar mujhe dikhti hai to mai aapko WhatsApp kar diya karungi. Baki aapne jo abhi customer care pe call kiya tha na usko close karne ke liye mai yaha pe ek aapko WhatsApp number pe ek message aa jayega ki matlab maine aapki jo obviously aapne call kiya tha customer care pe to uske liye baat ho gayi hai, theek hai?

Customer: Nahi mai ye keh raha hu isko hum hatana chahte hai to kaha se hatega ye?

Executive: Kya cheez hatana hai sir aapko?

Customer: IndiaMART agar hum band karna chahte hai to kaha se band hoga ye?

Executive: Band kyu karna hai aapne liya hai to service use karo na acche se.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Aapne jab service liya hai to aap use kariye acche se.

Customer: Mai bata raha hu na aapko mujhe ye chalu nahi rakhna IndiaMART.

Executive: Sir aap ek meri baat ko samajhiye aap na kisi ko matlab hire kar lo ye saari cheeze dekhne ke liye.

Customer: Are nahi.
Executive: Mahine ka aap unko 10 ya 12000 bhi doge na agar din ka wo char ya paanch ghante bhi dega to aapke liye kam se kam thoda sa benefit hoga. Ab maan lijiye aap bol rahe ho ki aapko kuch kuch cheeze samajh me hi nahi aa rahi hai aur aap bol rahe ho ki paisa waste ho gaya to usse achcha hai ki aap kisi ko hire kar lo wo dekhega aapki ye site.

Customer: Are na ho paye madam aisa na.

Executive: Aapke shop pe ya fir aapki jaha pe dukan hai aapki Balaji Murti Jaipur painting ka to waha pe koi kaam nahi karta hai?

Customer: Karte hai na kaafi saare baithe hai hamare bete bhi sab apne mal bechte hai.
Executive: To koi to hoga jo matlab thoda bahut samajhta ho jaise aapne bola ki aapko thoda bahut English me problem hai.

Customer: Haan English me problem hai madam.

Executive: Haan to unko aata hoga na thoda bahut wo jante hi honge thoda bahut kya jyada hi jante honge. To unko ek baar aap mujhe bata do to unko mai samjha dungi to wo aap wo shuru kar denge fir ye.

Customer: Madam hum to kya hai ki dusro product me kahi kaam dhandha chal raha hai is time me badhiya.

Executive: Hmm hmm.

Customer: Haan. Baki to bhai dekho tumhara haath me hai kya karao kya na karao.

Executive: Sir hamare haath me ab maan lijiye hum yaha se sirf aapka account hi check kar sakte hai kya kya ho raha hai kya kya nahi ho sakta wahi check kar sakte hai. Baki customer se baat karna customer ko call karna wo to sir aap karenge na.

Customer: Ab aap hume bata deo thoda bahut to kare hum.

Executive: Yes sir, wahi batane ke liye ab maan lijiye aapko thodi bahut problem ho rahi hai samajhne me English English ye sab cheeze to wahi mai aapko keh rahi hu ki din ka do ya teen ghante ye sab check kar le aisa koi hai aapki dukan pe to unko aap baat kara do mai unko samjha deti hu.

Customer: Nahi aisa koi nahi milega.

Executive: Achcha koi nahi hai?

Customer: Haan. Kaun hai madam aisa jo apna kaam chhod ke maan lo 1000 500 ka kaam chhod ke jo aapse baat kare wo. Mai aapko baat batau.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Achcha. Sahi hai apna kaam.
Executive: To fir aap kya hi kar sakti hu fir mai aapko WhatsApp pe details hi share kar dungi aap wahi se check kar lena, theek hai?

Customer: Madam mere paas me nahi dekho aapko mai sahi baat batau mere paas me lead nahi aa rahi.

Customer: Theek hai mai ya company walo se kehto kehto mar go.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Lekin ye apni baat ye apni baat sahi rakhe. Aapke upar account manager kaun hai madam ji? Shrivastav ya wo?
Executive: Nahi nahi Saransh hai aapka.
Customer: Saransh wo Saransh se upar kaun hai?

Executive: Unke upar abhi to sir mujhe idea nahi hai kyuki wahi hai hamare yaha pe manager.

Customer: Aapko kitne din ho gaye isme account IndiaMART account karte?
Executive: Mujhe yaha pe ho gaye sir ek dedh saal.

Customer: Yaha pe ek na Manisha Bansal hai Bansal ji jante ho aap unhe?

Executive: Nahi nahi sir yaha pe bahut log hai na department alag alag hai to aise hum to nahi jante.

Customer: Kitna department kitna staff hai apna idhar?

Executive: Sir 15 se 20000 to yahi pe hai isi wale branch me.

Customer: Kitna?

Executive: 15 se 20000.

Customer: 15 se 20000?

Executive: Haanji.

Customer: Achcha. Ek Manisha Bansal hai idhar me. Uske jab uska jab time tha na mere sath me uske samay me bahut achcha IndiaMART chala tha mera. Bahut achcha.
Executive: Achcha. Achcha.
Customer: Haan unhone bhi tha unhone man se guide kiya tha mujhe aur unhi ke kehne pe maine isko renewal karaya tha nahi mai isko renewal nahi kara raha tha.

Executive: Haan. To aapko kitne time ho gaye sir? Renewal hone wala hai aapka.
Customer: Haan.

Executive: Theek hai mai ek baar unka detail nikal ke fir dekhti hu ki mai aapki kitna help kar sakti hu.

Customer: Manisha Bansal ji har dusre teesre din call karti thi bechari aur khoob lead vagera jaise idhar udhar se aapke computer me se WhatsApp karti thi aur mujhe phone karke bolti thi bhaiya maine aapko lead dal di hai tab jaakar usne bahut achcha reason diya tha mujhe na.

Executive: Haan. Sir wahi mai aapko bol rahi hu ki mai bhi to aapko bol rahi hu ki WhatsApp pe mai bhi aapko share kar deti hu aur call ki jo bhi kuch puchna hai aap mujhe call kariye mai aapko bataungi.

Customer: Haan. Ab mai aapko wo aap mujhe dekho mere paas me kuch video hai jo marble murti ka mai paint karta hu na paint ka.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Usko aap usko aap IndiaMART pe daliye jara mere paas jisse kaam paye kam se kam. To aapko bhi wo milega ki bhai aap mujhe ek baar hi likh ke wo bhejo hai na.

Executive: Haan haan mai bhejti hu same number pe.

Customer: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is upset with IndiaMART services.

- Wants to close IndiaMART subscription.

- Not receiving leads.

- Difficulty in using IndiaMART due to less education.



Resolution:

- Executive will share leads on WhatsApp.

- Executive offered to help with account management.

- Executive will check for Manisha Bansal's details.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share leads on WhatsApp.

- Executive will check for Manisha Bansal's details.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, subscription, account management, whatsapp, renewal
